page.title: 16RUGBY UNION FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: {Penrith RUFC,Winters Park. Facilities: 3 pitches,training area, grandstand & railings,clubhouse.150 members.In 1970 club bought 17 acres: 7 let for grass, 10 for sport.4 teams play weekly, 2 home, 2 away.{Training}twice weekly. {Social functions:}annual dinner,annual Captain's Ball, Xmas festivities etc. Associated clubs:{Squash Club}4 courts & changing room, 400 members. 3 men's & 3 womens teams.{Tennis Club}4 courts 150 members.Pay peppercorn rent of Â£10 {Ladies Hockey Club}-25 members use 3rd team pitch.RUFC plan to develop Sports Complex with Eden District Council approval, but new buildings must fit into landscape. Funds needed:have sold some land for Old People's Home but no more houses allowed. Clubhouse is let for functions.Use ground for athletics at Penrith Gala, & summer 5-a-side soccer,& occasional circus type events
